forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. E winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. E winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
